outline:
1. to wear out, become old
    1. (Qal) to wear out
    2. (Piel)
      1. to wear out
      2. to wear out by use, use up completely
      3. to enjoy, use to the full
kjv_def: consume, enjoy long, become (make, wax) old, spend, waste.
strongs_def: to fail; by implication to wear out, decay (causatively, consume, spend)
